title: Learning Design Sharing and Utilization Workshop for Supporting Science Education Teacher Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on math-based science education methodologies using simulation/VR tools in smartphone-centric limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners achieve the ability to search for and apply learning designs in a COSMOS-style web-based repository
Learners establish a collaborative system to share and receive feedback on VR simulation-based science lesson designs with peer teachers.
Learners design three or more mathematics-integrated science learning activities executable in a smartphone environment.

resources: Access to Web-Based Learning Design Repository
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
